LanguageData.Gun_ATML.label: MS FGM-148 Javelin
LanguageData.Gun_ATML.description: A mounted light 미사일 시스템 MS FGM-148 Javelin on a slab. Uses one rocket.
LanguageData.Artillery_TOWMissile.label: BGM-71 TOW 미사일
LanguageData.Artillery_TOWMissile.description: TOW 미사일 Launcher. Launches high speed 미사일s. Medium accuracy with medium range.
LanguageData.Gun_MissileSystem.label: Medium 미사일 시스템
LanguageData.Gun_MissileSystem.description: A mounted medium 미사일 시스템 on a 터렛. Uses three rockets.
LanguageData.Gun_RL.label: Heavy 미사일 시스템
LanguageData.Gun_RL.description: A mounted heavy 미사일 시스템 on a 터렛. Uses six rockets.
